content: a court in milan has made a final decision to dissolve a community of parties who owned a piece of real estate the property is located in milan and consists of a plot of land the court determined the shares of each party involved with some parties owning a larger share than others the plaintiffs wanted the property to be divided equally but the courtappointed expert witness found it to be indivisible and recommended selling it instead the court agreed and ordered the sale of the property the proceeds will be divided among the parties according to their shares the costs of the litigation will be settled in the final judgment the decision was made on july 13 2020 and filed with the clerks office on july 20 2020
